definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: The girl, obviously smitten herself, is afraid the boy will see her looking at him.
sentences.chinese: 女孩，顯然地已墜入情網，很怕男孩看到自己在看他。

sentences.english: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person. (Mignon McLaughlin)
sentences.chinese: 成功的婚姻總是多次墜入情網，但鍾情於同一人。

sentences.english: Couples who had just fallen in love had significantly higher levels of nerve growth factor, or NGF.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛墜入情網的戀人明顯有較高水平的神經生長因子。

sentences.english: When I fell in love, I realised for the first time that I was lovable.
sentences.chinese: 當我墜入情網時，我才第一次發現我是會被人愛上的。

sentences.english: What do you get when you fall in love?
sentences.chinese: 當你墜入情網的時候你得到了什麼？

sentences.english: Women fall in love through their ear, and men through their eyes.
sentences.chinese: 情話會使女人墜入情網，男人則是因爲眼中的美麗。

sentences.english: Sometimes people say they just fall in love too frequently.
sentences.chinese: 人們有時會說她們會輕易的墜入情網。

sentences.english: Gravitation cannot be held responsible for people falling in love.
sentences.chinese: 萬有引力無法用來解釋人們是如何墜入情網的。

sentences.english: Nobody is perfect until you fall in love with them.
sentences.chinese: 一開始沒人是完美的，直到後來你與某人墜入情網。
